about_the_game:
This is a survival game that under third person perspective. Players will play a witch who survives in the forest. In order to gain her magic power, She would never stop exploring or fighting.

Features

Special Ability


The witch has special gifts. She can use telekinesis to lift a stone or launch it like a bullet. She can also launch a fireball by the power that drawn from the undead.

Get Power


The witch don't have all the power inborn.She needs to hunt all kinds of magical creatures to get special powers. Therefore, continuous exploration and fighting is necessary.

Building System


Magic power can't let the witch out of all the dangers. It is necessary to build some fortifications. Players can control the witch to collect the building materials and build creative buildings.

Environment


Foggy day often occurs in forests where the witch lives in. When the fog is heavy, the vision becomes very poor. Magical creatures will become more active in foggy weather at the same time.
detailed_description:
This is a survival game that under third person perspective. Players will play a witch who survives in the forest. In order to gain her magic power, She would never stop exploring or fighting.

Features

Special Ability


The witch has special gifts. She can use telekinesis to lift a stone or launch it like a bullet. She can also launch a fireball by the power that drawn from the undead.

Get Power


The witch don't have all the power inborn.She needs to hunt all kinds of magical creatures to get special powers. Therefore, continuous exploration and fighting is necessary.

Building System


Magic power can't let the witch out of all the dangers. It is necessary to build some fortifications. Players can control the witch to collect the building materials and build creative buildings.

Environment


Foggy day often occurs in forests where the witch lives in. When the fog is heavy, the vision becomes very poor. Magical creatures will become more active in foggy weather at the same time.
name: The Psychic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: Be a Psychic to experience a larruping adventure. Living in the foggy place and exploring the unknown. Collecting resources and discovering magic treasures. Build and expand your own castle.
